summary: This document is a summary of monthly charges for an AT&T Wireless account belonging to an individual named Holly Robson. It details the account's previous balance, payments received, current charges, and various fees associated with the account. The document also includes information about usage and taxes applicable to the account. This document contains detailed voice usage records for a specific phone number associated with the Epstein case. It includes call logs with dates, times, and locations, indicating incoming and outgoing calls, as well as charges incurred. The records suggest frequent communication from various locations in Florida, particularly Palm Beach. This document contains detailed records of voice and text message usage for a specific phone number associated with Epstein. It includes timestamps, call durations, and charges for various calls and messages made from January 10 to January 11, 2004. The records indicate extensive communication activity, primarily from Palm Beach, Florida.

persons.name: Holly Robson
persons.context: Holly Robson is the account holder for the AT&T Wireless account detailed in this document, which includes billing information and usage charges.
